00041 const unsigned _minEntries = 10;
00043 const double _minMean    = 0;

00048 const double _parMin[3]  = {0, 0, 0};

00093 int main( int argc, char *argv[] )
00094 {
00095     if(argc==1|| strcmp(argv[1],"-h")==0){
00096         printHelp();
00097         return 1;
00098     }
00099 
00100     setParameters(argc,argv);
00101     printParameters();
00102 
00103     cout<<"-----------------------"<<endl;
00104     printf("Compiled file:\t %s\n"
00105            "When:\t %s, %s.\n",__FILE__,__DATE__,__TIME__); 
00106     cout<<"-----------------------"<<endl<<endl;;
00107 
00108     TFile* file=new TFile(_infilename);
00109     
00110     TH1* h=0;
00111     h=dynamic_cast<TH1*>(file->Get(_histoname));
00112     if (h==0){
00113         throw runtime_error( "No histogram!" );
00114         }
00115 
00116     TH1* initial;
00117 
00118     unsigned entries= (unsigned)h->GetEntries();
00119     printf ( "entries: %i \n",entries );
00120     double mean= h->GetMean();
00121     printf ( "mean: %.2f\n",mean );
00122     if(entries>_minEntries&&mean>_minMean){
00123         FitLikelihood* Mip=new FitLikelihood(h);
00124 
00125         // for direct numerical computation is needed to adjust properly the cut for lower limit of
00126         // sigma gauss
00127         double histoMax=Mip->getHistogram()->GetXaxis()->GetXmin();
00128         double histoMin=Mip->getHistogram()->GetXaxis()->GetXmin();
00129         double lowerCut=(histoMax-histoMin)/1000.;
00130         if(_useFFT==1){
00131         Mip->setParlimitslo(_parMin[0],_parMin[1],_parMin[2]);
00132         }else{
00133         Mip->setParlimitslo(_parMin[0],_parMin[1],lowerCut);
00134         }
00135         Mip->setParlimitshi(_parMax[0],_parMax[1],_parMax[2]);
00136         
00137        //needed to be carefully tuned 
00138         initial=Mip->cloneHisto(1,2,4); 
00139 
00140 
00141         Mip->findPeakInitBezier(_Bezierorder, _Bezierrebin);
00142         Mip->findRangeMin(initial);
00143 
00144        //Mip->setRange(0.5,3);                                
00145         double peakInit=Mip->getPeakInit();
00146         double RMS=Mip->getHistogram()->GetRMS();
00147         double rangeMin=Mip->getRangeMin(); 
00148         if(_rangeExplicit==0){
00149         Mip->setRange(peakInit -(peakInit-rangeMin)*0.9,peakInit+_range*RMS );
00150         }else{
00151             Mip->setRange(_leftRange,_rightRange);
00152         }
00153         h->Rebin(_rebin);
00154         
00155         printf ( "----------------Start of fit---------------------------\n" );
00156         
00157         double fitValues[3]={0,0,0};
00158         double effitValue[3]={0,0,0};
00159         double peak=0, epeak=0;
00160 
00161         Langaus* LXG= new Langaus(Mip->getRange(),Mip->getIniValues(),Mip->getParMin(),Mip->getParMax(),_useFFT);
00162 
00163         LXG->langaufit(h,fitValues,effitValue,peak,epeak);
00164 
00165         
00166         printf("Obtained parameters from fit:\n"
00167             "\tPeak:\t%.3f+-%.3f\n"
00168             "\tLandau mean:\t%.3f+-%.3f\n"
00169             "\tLandau sigma:\t%.3f+-%.3f\n"
00170             "\tGauss sigma:\t%.3f+-%.3f\n",
00171             peak,epeak,fitValues[1],effitValue[1],fitValues[0],effitValue[0],fitValues[2],effitValue[2]);
00172 
00173         
00174         
00175         Bezier* bezier;
00176         bezier=Mip->getBezier();
00177         TMultiGraph* bezierGraph;
00178         bezierGraph=bezier->plotBezier();
00179         TFile fileBezier("bezier.root","recreate");
00180           TCanvas can("can");
00181            can.cd();
00182            bezierGraph->Draw("ap");
00183            can.Write();
00184         fileBezier.Close();
00185 
00186         
00187         RooPlot* frame;
00188         /*  Get RooPlot, create legend via TPaveText */
00189         if(_isRootfile==1){ 
00190 
00191             frame=Mip->writeRooroot(h,LXG);
00192             TFile fitfile(_outroot,"update");                                       
00193             TPaveText* tbox=new TPaveText(0.55,0.5,0.85,0.85,"BRNDC");
00194             stringstream nameLab;
00195             char buffer1[40], buffer2[40];
00196             sprintf(buffer1,"%.3f",LXG->getMl()->getVal() );
00197             sprintf(buffer2,"%.3f",LXG->getMlerror());
00198             nameLab<<"#mu_{L}="<<buffer1<<"#pm"<<buffer2;
00199             tbox->AddText(nameLab.str().c_str());
00200             nameLab.str("");
00201 
00202             sprintf(buffer1,"%.3f",LXG->getSl()->getVal() );
00203             sprintf(buffer2,"%.3f",LXG->getSlerror());
00204             nameLab<<"#sigma_{L}="<<buffer1<<"#pm"<<buffer2;
00205             tbox->AddText(nameLab.str().c_str());
00206             nameLab.str("");
00207 
00208             sprintf(buffer1,"%.3f",abs(LXG->getSg()->getVal()) );
00209             sprintf(buffer2,"%.3f",LXG->getSgerror());
00210             nameLab<<"#sigma_{G}"<<"="<<buffer1<<"#pm"<<buffer2;
00211             tbox->AddText(nameLab.str().c_str());
00212             nameLab.str("");
00213 
00214             sprintf(buffer1,"%.3f",peak);
00215             sprintf(buffer2,"%.3f",epeak);
00216             nameLab<<"A_{MIP}"<<"="<<buffer1<<"#pm"<<buffer2;
00217             tbox->AddText(nameLab.str().c_str());
00218 
00219             frame->addObject(tbox);
00220             frame->Draw() ; 
00221             frame->Write();
00222             fitfile.Close();
00223         }
00224 
00225 
00226         
00227         if(_isOutfile == 1){
00228             int ID=(_mod<<SHIFT|_chip)<<SHIFT|_chan;
00229             _outfile<<ID<<'\t'<<peak<<'\t'<<epeak<<'\t'<<Mip->getHistogram()->GetEntries()<<'\t'<<LXG->getSl()->getVal()<<'\t'<<LXG->getSlerror()<<'\t'<<LXG->getMl()->getVal()<<'\t'<<LXG->getMlerror()<<'\t'<<abs(LXG->getSg()->getVal())<<'\t'<<LXG->getSgerror()<<endl;
00230             _outfile.close();
00231         }
00232 
00233         delete Mip;
00234         delete LXG;
00235         }
00236     
00237     h->Delete();
00238     return 0;
00239 }
00240 
00241 void printHelp(){
00242     cout<<"Obligatory parameters: "<< endl
00243         <<"\t -infile <root input file>"<<endl
00244         <<"\t -histoname <name of histogram>"<<endl;
00245     cout<<endl;
00246     cout<<"Other parameters: "<<endl
00247         <<"\t -outtxt <txt output>"<<endl
00248         <<"\t -outroot <root file output>"<<endl
00249         <<"\t -range <range of fit(explained in Fitlikelihood)>"<<endl
00250         <<"\t -rangeExplicit <rangeLeft rangeRight>"<<endl
00251         <<"\t -rebin <rebin of histogram>"<<endl
00252         <<"\t -bezierorder <order of bezier function>"<<endl
00253         <<"\t -bezierrebin <bezier rebin>"<<endl
00254         <<"\t -useFFT <bool(0)>"<<endl;
00255 }

00257 //_____________________________________________________________________________________________________
00258 void setParameters(int argc, char* argv[]){
00259    _isOutfile=0;
00260    _isRootfile=0;
00261    
00262    
00263    for(int i=0; i<argc;++i){ 
00264     if(strcmp("-infile",argv[i])==0){
00265         _infilename=argv[++i];
00266     }
00267     if(strcmp("-outtxt", argv[i])==0){
00268         _outfile.open(argv[++i],fstream::app);
00269         _outfileName=argv[i];
00270         _isOutfile=1;
00271     }
00272     if(strcmp("-histoname", argv[i])==0){
00273         _histoname=argv[++i];
00274     }
00275     if(strcmp("-outroot", argv[i])==0){
00276         _outroot=argv[++i];
00277         _isRootfile=1;
00278     }
00279     if(strcmp("-range", argv[i])==0){
00280         _range=atof(argv[++i]);
00281     }
00282     if(strcmp("-rebin", argv[i])==0){
00283         _rebin=atoi(argv[++i]);
00284     }
00285     if(strcmp("-bezierorder", argv[i])==0){
00286         _Bezierorder=atoi(argv[++i]);
00287     }
00288     if(strcmp("-bezierrebin", argv[i])==0){
00289         _Bezierrebin=atoi(argv[++i]);
00290     }
00291     if(strcmp("-rangeExplicit", argv[i])==0){
00292         _rangeExplicit=1;
00293         _leftRange=atof(argv[++i]);
00294         _rightRange=atof(argv[++i]);
00295     }
00296     if(strcmp("-useFFT", argv[i])==0){
00297         _useFFT=(bool)atoi(argv[++i]);
00298     }
00299 if(strcmp("-mod", argv[i])==0){
00300         _mod=(int)atoi(argv[++i]);
00301     }
00302 if(strcmp("-chip", argv[i])==0){
00303         _chip=(int)atoi(argv[++i]);
00304     }
00305 if(strcmp("-chan", argv[i])==0){
00306         _chan=(int)atoi(argv[++i]);
00307     }
00308 
00309 }
00310 }
00311 void printParameters(){
00312     printf ( "Input rootfile: %s \n",_infilename );
00313     printf ( "Name of input histogram: %s \n",_histoname );
00314     if(_isRootfile==1) printf ( "Name of output root file: %s \n",_outroot );
00315     if(_isOutfile) printf ( "Name of output txt file: %s \n",_outfileName );
00316     printf ( "Rebining of histogram: %i \n",_rebin );
00317     printf ( "Right range: %.1f \n",_range);
00318     if(_rangeExplicit==1) printf ( "Range of fit: <%.1f,%.1f> \n",_leftRange,_rightRange);
00319     printf ( "Mod:%i, chip:%i, chan:%i \n",_mod,_chip,_chan );
00320 }
